Package flex2.compiler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILocalizableMessage
    This is a marker interface for all localizable messages.
    Logger
    The base interface of all loggers in the compiler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompilerAPI
    This class orchestrates delegation to the subcompilers using batch1() when -conservative is true or batch2(), the default.
    Source
    This class represents the information associated with a single file while it's being compiled.
    SourceList
    A SourceList represents a list of files, following the single public definition rule, and an associated path where dependencies can be found.
    SourcePath
    A list of paths specified by the -source-path option, where dependencies, following the single public definition rule, can be resolved.
    SymbolTable
    This class supports looking up information for a class or a style and looking up a Source by QName or by resource bundle name.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CompilerException
    This class provides a common base class for all exceptions thrown by the compiler.
    SourceList.FileNotInSourcePath  
    SourceList.UnsupportedFileType
